page.title: 19Businesses in Milton Ernest
page.content: The village of{Milton Ernest}has two small general stores, one of which includes the Post Office. There are two public houses; The Queen's Head and The Swan, The Strawberry Tree Tea Shop, a Garage and Petrol Filling Station, Chafer's, who supply agricultural needs, a nursing home (housed in{Milton Ernest Hall),}a large Garden Centre, a small Factory selling office furniture, a Tennis Club, a private Catering Firm, two Farms; one dairy and one dairy and arable and several small Building firms. The{Village Hall}is used by the {school}for physical education and for the taking of lunch. It is used by the Women's Institute, senior citizens (The Good Companions Club), the Youth Club, Pre_school Nursery Unit, whistdrives, jumble sales, antique fairs and general entertainment.
